# api-framework-hono

Hono routes, OpenAPI, Zod validation

## Tags

`hono` `openapi` `zod` `rest-api` `validation`

## Installation

Add this plugin to your Claude Code configuration:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["api-framework-hono"]
}
```

## Usage

This skill is automatically available when installed.
